item.description:
Come hit a bucket at The Fairways in Branford http://www.fairwaysdr...
We have several experienced golfers willing to teach us newbies. How lucky are we!!! This should be a fun way to spend a spring afternoon and evening. Small buckets are $6.00, Medium $8.00 and large are $12.00 ($10.00 if you sign up for their email newsletter)
They also have a free putting green.

Once we have gone through our buckets we can head over to Chucks's Margarita Grill for what else ...a Margarita and dinner or munchies
http://www.chucksbran...

This should be a fun way to spend a spring afternoon and evening.

Hope to see you there!!!!

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Driving Range and Margaritas!!!!
